(0,): As a data submitter, I want to create a new submission, so that I can submit my data for processing As a data submitter, I want to publish my submission, so that my data becomes publicly available As a data submitter, I want to upload a CSV file, so that I can submit my data in a standard format As a data validator, I want to run validation on a submission, so that I can check its compliance with rules
(2,): As a data consumer, I want to view published files, so that I can access the latest available data As a data consumer, I want to filter published files by agency, so that I can find relevant data more easily As a data validator, I want to view validation rules, so that I can understand the requirements for submissions As a submitter, I want to view the submission dashboard, so that I can track all my submissions
(1,): As a user, I want to view the home page, so that I can access the main portal As a user, I want to view resources, so that I can find documentation and guides As a FABS user, I want to view the FABS landing page, so that I can access FABS-specific features As a DABS user, I want to view the DABS landing page, so that I can access DABS-specific features As a user, I want to access the help page, so that I can find support when needed
